Text: there's a problem with the audio. it's out of sync, and i'm not tech-savvy enough to fix it on my own
Until someone posts an in-sync version, watch this one with VLC as follows: Tools | Track synchronization | Audio/Video | Advance of audio over video: 0.500 s.
